name: Insane Adventures of Andy
description:
I really tried to get into what Pong is thinking each and every game and I hope I have captured it here!

This is also an experiment with Dialogue and cuts, it seemed like a great opportunity to add heavy amounts of talking to a game that usually never has any. I really hope you enjoy the game as much as I had making it (I had a so so time making it...)

:)

-Sebastian @sebasrez

Track Listing:

1. A journey awaits - Pierre Bondoerffer

2. Enchanted Destiny - Jacob Greenmount
